abstract: Indiana Gov Mike Pence says he will support legislation to clarify intent behind state religious freedom law that has been criticized by those who say it will allow businesses to discriminate against gay people.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Mike Pence said he would support legislation to “clarify the intent” of a new state law that has attracted widespread criticism over concerns that it could allow discrimination against gay people.

headline.main: Indiana May Clarify Religious Objections Law
headline.print_headline: Indiana May Clarify Religious Objections Law

snippet: Gov. Mike Pence said he would support legislation to “clarify the intent” of a new state law that has attracted widespread criticism over concerns that it could allow discrimination against gay people.
